attributes.action: give british people the right to a referendum to get our powers back
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: its more than 30 years since we had a referendum on what is now called the European union.back then people thought they were voting to stay in a common market. when in fact they had signed up to the creation of a common country, the european union and its capital Brussells.WE WANT A REFERENDUM AND OUR POWERS BACK.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
